title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2023.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (tanaiste minister foreign affair minister defence) order 2023

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2023.
heading: 2. Sharon McGowan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Sharon McGowan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Foreign Affairs, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Foreign Affairs with effect from 3 
April 2023.
text_norm: 2 sharon mcgowan particular whose address deposited office department foreign affair appointed special adviser tanaiste minister foreign affair effect 3 april 2023

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2023.
heading: GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government,
text_raw:
2023. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

24 October, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th October, 2023.
